snippet: HONG KONG - Prime Minister Wen Jiabao said Thursday that China would consider helping shore up Europe's finances. But he left unclear whether China was willing to drop conditions that so far have made its help unappealing to European nations. Chinese...
abstract: HONG KONG - Prime Minister Wen Jiabao said Thursday that China would consider helping shore up Europe's finances. But he left unclear whether China was willing to drop conditions that so far have made its help unappealing to European nations. Chinese leaders have sought concessions, such as getting the European Union to relax restrictions on low-cost Chinese goods. Read more »
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG - Prime Minister Wen Jiabao said Thursday that China would consider helping shore up Europe's finances. But he left unclear whether China was willing to drop conditions that so far have made its help unappealing to European nations. Chinese leaders have sought concessions, such as getting the European Union to relax restrictions on low-cost Chinese goods. Read more »

headline.main: China Considers Offering Aid to Europe
